record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period for the transaction of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein and with the time equally divided between the two leaders or their designees.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum and ask unanimous consent that the time be equally charged to each side.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
